meta.title: WaiWai - AI Agents for Sales and Marketing Automation
meta.description: AI agents for sales and marketing automation. Increase sales by 21%, reduce routine work by 41%. Smart agents for email campaigns, CRM, marketplaces, and social media.
meta.keywords: AI agents, artificial intelligence, sales automation, marketing, email marketing, CRM, marketing automation, increase sales, process optimization, intelligent agents, chatbots, communication automation, AI assistants, smart agents, business automation, AI for business, artificial intelligence in sales
meta.ogTitle: WaiWai - AI Agents for Sales and Marketing Automation
meta.ogDescription: AI agents for sales and marketing automation. Increase sales by 21%, reduce routine work by 41%. Smart agents for email campaigns, CRM, marketplaces, and social media.
meta.twitterTitle: WaiWai - AI Agents for Sales and Marketing Automation
meta.twitterDescription: AI agents for sales and marketing automation. Increase sales by 21%, reduce routine work by 41%. Smart agents for email campaigns, CRM, marketplaces, and social media.

hero.title: Artificial Intelligence that truly understands your business
hero.subtitle: Find leads, send them personalized messages, and manage conversations. Free up resources for business growth while AI handles the routine

leadSearch.title: Lead Discovery
leadSearch.description: WaiWai assembles precise audiences for your campaigns: Node.js developers with Russian roots, retailers with physical stores, logistics companies trading with China, and other segments that previously required manual research.

telegramSearch.title: Telegram Keyword Search
telegramSearch.description: The agent monitors thematic channels and chats, tracks the keywords you care about, highlights fresh discussions, and captures relevant contacts while your team focuses on product work.

linkedinOutreach.title: LinkedIn Messaging
linkedinOutreach.description: We craft multi-step sequences, tailor each message, nurture the dialogue until a warm reply arrives, and pass only sales-ready conversations to your team.

leadModule.title: Lead Discovery
leadModule.paragraph1: When you need nuanced segments, WaiWai carefully brings them together: Node.js developers with Russian roots, business owners with a footprint in St. Petersburg, and founders with the right background.
leadModule.paragraph2: In parallel, the system tracks promising industries — offline retail networks, Russia–China logistics, startups with annual revenue from RUB 1M to 100M — and prepares a structured database ready for outreach.

outreachModule.title: Lead Outreach
outreachModule.paragraph1: Once the list is ready, the agent notices live signals: a company has just added a shipping section on its website, is actively hiring sales talent, or is promoting high-end real estate.
outreachModule.paragraph2: WaiWai tunes tone and channels for each cluster — marketplace sellers with transparent delivery terms, Dubai-based realtors with Russian roots, luxury real-estate developers — and runs sequences that move leads toward a meeting.

basic.name: Basic
basic.note: Great for pilots and first hypotheses
features: Includes 1,000 DICH – personalized touchpoints with leads
One active module (Telegram or LinkedIn) plus CRM export

standard.name: Standard
standard.note: Built for a scaling sales funnel
features: Run Telegram, LinkedIn, and Email modules simultaneously

premium.name: Premium
premium.note: For large teams and high-volume campaigns
features: Includes 5,000 DICH – advanced segmentation and outreach
Dedicated success manager, SLA, and advanced analytics

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Custom architecture aligned with your compliance and security
features: Deployment inside private clouds or on-prem environments
Integrations with corporate CRM and BI stacks
Dedicated WaiWai project squad and executive sponsor

egor.name: Egor Lukin
egor.description: Full-stack software engineer with 10 years of experience. Worked at Evil Martians, Aviasales, Dualboot, and early-stage startups. Launched his own SaaS products.

pavel.name: Pavel Kalashnikov
pavel.description: 13 years in commercial development, led large LMS, HoReCa, and media projects. Open-source enthusiast.

anastasiaM.name: Anastasia Moshina
anastasiaM.description: Ruby on Rails developer who helped build large fintech products. Over five years of engineering experience.

aleksey.name: Alexey Pavlov
aleksey.description: Former editor-in-chief at Sostav with 12 years in journalism and PR.

vyacheslav.name: Vyacheslav Ermolenko
vyacheslav.description: Eight years designing digital products. Led design teams and crafted design systems for fintech, Web3, business, and cultural projects.

anastasiaS.name: Anastasia Soboleva
anastasiaS.description: Full-stack QA engineer with 5+ years of experience. Helps teams ship stable, user-friendly products by catching critical issues before release.

mik.name: Mik Wiseman
mik.description: Founder of WaiWai, launched nine startups; graduate of the MSU Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics and winner of international AI hackathons.

waiComputer.name: Wai Computer
waiComputer.description: Twelve years of uninterrupted work without vacations or sick days. Speaks every programming language at once, occasionally freezes on Zoom calls, dreams of a promotion to a quantum computer.

recognition.text: WaiWai is part of Skolkovo, the Russian Software Registry, and the MTC

stats.timeFreed: Recruiters' time freed up for other tasks

falcone.title: Falcone
falcone.description: Found clients for delivery service - Ozon, Wildberries, Yandex Market sellers. WaiWai sent personalized emails using open data about customers and their needs.

akBarsBank.title: Ak Bars Bank
akBarsBank.description: Automated the recruitment process on HeadHunter. For employee search, WaiWai creates personalized letters based on candidate profiles. The system sorts incoming requests and responds to them, saving recruiters' time.

ontico.title: Ontico Conferences
ontico.description: For selling tickets to the Berlin conference, WaiWai found programmers by programming language and attendance at similar events. Selecting relevant leads and personalized messages increased conversion by 2.4 times.

rossi.title: Rossi Hotel
rossi.description: Increased business client flow for the hotel. WaiWai sent personalized messages to companies sending employees on business trips to St. Petersburg. LinkedIn became the main channel for lead generation.

cta.title: While competitors are looking for clients - yours are already reading messages from WaiWai
